member.name: HTTP_REQUEST_INFO
member.summary: The HTTP_REQUEST_INFO structure extends the HTTP_REQUEST structure with additional information about the request.

member.name: HTTP_REQUEST_INFO.InfoType
member.summary: A member of the enumeration specifying the type of information contained in this structure.

member.name: HTTP_REQUEST_INFO.InfoLength
member.summary: The length, in bytes, of the pInfo member.

member.name: HTTP_REQUEST_INFO.pInfo
member.summary: A pointer to the structure when the InfoType member is HttpRequestInfoTypeAuth; otherwise NULL.
